background: Production-grade multi-tier AWS infrastructure with comprehensive security, monitoring, and multi-environment support. Includes VPC with public/private subnets, Auto Scaling EC2 instances behind ALB, encrypted RDS database, S3 storage, KMS encryption, CloudWatch monitoring, and SNS alerting. All resources properly tagged and configured for dev/staging/prod environments using Terraform variables and tfvars files.
author: koushik-turing
